name: BOX align
description: "Relax, have a cup of coffee and enjoy eliminating all the boxes". A minimalist puzzle game with great challenges.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 11 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
